about_the_game:
The Hero’s Tutor - Bond Memory that provides bonus EXP.

*The Hero's Tutor Bond Memory can be obtained via The Temple of Recollection. The Early Purchase Bonus allows for early access to this item.
*Early Purchase Bonus items are applicable to Standard Edition and Digital Deluxe purchases made from 05/27/2023 – 10/12/2023.

content_descriptors.notes: Infinity Strash: DRAGON QUEST The Adventure of Dai contains fantasy violence, mild blood and mild language in certain areas of the game.

detailed_description:
